title: How to ssh to my Pixel from Mac Terminal
content:
I want to ssh into my Pixel phone via my mac Terminal.. 

I know the default 

User is admin
password is admin 

put when ssh from my mac it throw error that my port is closed in my phone..

is there away to open it or use a 3rd party
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
